posts.post_content:
I was pointEd to this site after growing more and more frustrated with eBay.
I have a few hundred in paypal to burn, I'm looking for SGC graded T206 cards.
I'm looking to pay around eBay auction end prices. 
I'm open to just about any player preferably in an SGC 20 and above, of course depending on eye appeal. 

Especially looking for a Lajoie Portrait, Ed Walsh and Addie Joss (any)

Looking forward to hearing from people.

Thanks
